name: Diana Golbi
description: '''Diana Golbi''' ({{langx|he|דיאנה גולבי}}; born January 16, 1992) is an Israeli-Russian actress and singer, the eighth winner of ''[[Kokhav Nolad]]'', the Israeli version of ''[[Pop Idol]]''. Golbi is the third female participant to win the show (following [[Ninet Tayeb]] on the first season and [[Roni Dalumi]] on the [[Kokhav Nolad 7|seventh season]]).
